wowapi.retail.retail module¶

class wowapi.retail.retail.RetailApi(api)¶

Bases: object

This class just helps structure our wrapper, creates accessible API endpoint accessors for retail World of Warcraft

Parameters

api (API) – An instance of our generic API object
